__e: Look, I don't know how you pay Hector... and I don't think I wanna know.
Said he wasn't making enough money to justify the trouble he had with this... damn new Hector and, of course, you.
I know, but all I can think about is Hector and what might be happening over there.
But I am not leaving until I know where Hector is.
A-and I want to make sure Hector's okay.
Look how excited Hector J. is to see you.
No Hector, they will wake up everyday and do that same shit they always do.
You told him your name was Hector! Don't let him know you know.
But this kid has something that you and I and Hector don't have.
But here's the thing. And I think you would be incredibly proud... to see him on the field.
Well... if Hector really is a spirit, you tell him hello for me.
